member.summary: The type of the disk, i.e. 'Fixed'.

member.summary: The total size of the disk, in bytes.

member.summary: The total size of the disk, in gigabytes.

member.name: T:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter
member.summary: Filters to apply to container enumeration.

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.CreatedBefore
member.summary: If not null, match objects created before the specified time (UTC).

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.CreatedAfter
member.summary: If not null, match objects created after the specified time (UTC).

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.UpdatedBefore
member.summary: If not null, match objects updated before the specified time (UTC).

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.UpdatedAfter
member.summary: If not null, match objects updated after the specified time (UTC).

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.LastAccessBefore
member.summary: If not null, match objects last accessed before the specified time (UTC).

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.LastAccessAfter
member.summary: If not null, match objects last accessed after the specified time (UTC).

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.Prefix
member.summary: If not null, match objects with the specified prefix in the key.

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.Md5
member.summary: If not null, match objects with the specified MD5 hash value.

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.ContentType
member.summary: If not null, match objects of the specified content type.

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.SizeMin
member.summary: If not null, match objects of at least the specified size.

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.SizeMax
member.summary: If not null, match objects that are less than the specified size.

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.Tags
member.summary: If not null, match objects that contain each of the supplied tags.

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.KeyValuePairs
member.summary: If not null, match objects that contain each of the supplied key-value pairs.

member.name: M:KvpbaseSDK.EnumerationFilter.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiates the object.

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.KvpbaseStream.CanRead
member.summary: Indicates whether or not the stream can be read. Always true.

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.KvpbaseStream.CanSeek
member.summary: Indicates whether or not the position in the stream can be modified using seek. Always true.

member.summary: Indicates whether or not the stream can timeout. Always false.

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.KvpbaseStream.CanWrite
member.summary: Indicates whether or not the stream can be written. Always true.

member.summary: Indicates the length of the object.

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.KvpbaseStream.Position
member.summary: Indicates the current position in the stream.

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.KvpbaseStream.ReadTimeout
member.summary: The read timeout. Do not use.

member.name: P:KvpbaseSDK.KvpbaseStream.WriteTimeout
member.summary: The write timeout. Do not use.
